item.title: Wong, my AK-47 Progress
item.author: invalid@example.com (ROFL 451)
item.dc:creator: ROFL 451
item.content:encoded: Here is a screenshot of my progress so far. I added a bit of touchup and also added the butt into the model. Oh yeah, and how do you round and smooth edges? Go from bloky model to smooth product? Is it some filter you apply? Thanks.

item.title: Trentdaddy 2.0!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Trentdaddy)
item.dc:creator: Trentdaddy
item.content:encoded:
Well, it has taken over 9000 years, but I've finally got a computer worth gaming with. Though, I mainly do most of my gaming on my PS3 anyways, so it doesn't matter. Not sure if it matters now though, but I guess this is my way of saying hi to all the crazy folks I used to talk to here.

Right now, just trying to find game demos and stuff to test my computer out. It's good to be able to play something beyond ....Unreal (PUN SO INTENDED) Tournament and SimCity 3000. Might install the...

Trentdaddy 2.0!

item.title: An open invite to all of you Guests who visit the board
item.author: invalid@example.com (EvilDrWong)
item.dc:creator: EvilDrWong
item.content:encoded:
Hello, Guest! Have you ever read one of our threads and said to yourself "I have something to contribute to this conversation, but I'm afraid of being stormed by the craziness?" Well my friends, you could not have picked a better time to register!
I always found it odd that most of the time when there are a few users browsing, the majority of you are guests. With any luck, at least one of you guests is a regular lurker. And in which case, you should join! Chat it up with us, make...

An open invite to all of you Guests who visit the board

item.title: So, any UT stuff still laying around?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Nemephosis)
item.dc:creator: Nemephosis
item.content:encoded:
Hey, I recently got back into UT (like, the first UT) (again) and I was wondering if anyone happened to have a couple things I'd enjoy having again.

One of them's called the Telezipper, which later became the GAR-T, or the GrabAtRange-Telezipper. Primary fire shot a shock beam that teleported you to where it hit and secondary fired an Instagib beam that picked up any item you shot with it.

Next, I'm looking for one of Kangus' weapons. It was a weapon that fired random projectiles. I...

So, any UT stuff still laying around?

item.title: Ideas to improve WMP
item.author: invalid@example.com (Postal)
item.dc:creator: Postal
item.content:encoded:
The site doesnt seem to be used much

what about putting a poll in the space under the link sidebar, and that could be updated weekly.

Perhaps also a newest files list? The latest 5 or 10 files.

Or maybe even this:

The site isnt used much, perhaps what about even just converting the site into the forums. Have a news section, a file section where only the admins can start posts, put a post up witha description and a link, and other people can make their replies. Perhaps have the...

Ideas to improve WMP

item.title: Can't add more than 4 weapons with WoRM2K4
item.author: invalid@example.com (Devil_Dogz)
item.dc:creator: Devil_Dogz
item.content:encoded:
If I try to add more than 4 weapons with WoRM2K4 - Extra Gear, then I can't scroll and nobody on the server gets any of them. It works fine at 4, but no higer.

I'm running a listen server, latest patch, and have the severpackages entry in my .ini file.

Any thoughts?

item.title: Where is the news?
item.author: invalid@example.com (meowcat)
item.dc:creator: meowcat
item.content:encoded:
So what happened to the front news page? All I get from either IE or Firefox is:

"Warning: mysql_connect(): Protocol mismatch. Server Version = 9 Client Version = 10 in /www/wod/www/phpnews_1/news.php on line 31

Warning: mysql_fetch_array(): supplied argument is not a valid MySQL result resource in /www/wod/www/phpnews_1/news.php on line 38

Warning: mysql_fetch_assoc(): supplied argument is not a valid MySQL result resource in /www/wod/www/phpnews_1/news.php on line 147"

item.title: More ****ing With Unreal 1
item.author: invalid@example.com (Smoke39)
item.dc:creator: Smoke39
item.content:encoded:
I recently started working on an old mod of mine for Unreal again. Check the first screen. Laser sight and a masked skin that makes the sniper rifle mesh look different. Not that big a deal, right? Check out the second one. I "programmed" a reload animation for the gun by messing with its location and rotation. Using those offsets, I was able to keep the laser sight in sync instead of just turning it off for the reload sequence. I think it's pretty slick. Programming animations like...

More ****ing With Unreal 1

item.title: Ninjas!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Smoke39)
item.dc:creator: Smoke39
item.content:encoded:
So my new roommates an' I were wanting to play something with multiplayer, and I brought my copy of Unreal Gold, so we all installed it and played it a bit. Afterword, we all thought that the dispersion pistol was lameness, so I got the idea to replace it with shuriken (which darken you and make you faster'n'stuff) while watching one of them play Ninja Gaiden.

One thing kinda led to another, and now there's a kaginawa (grappling hook), tetsu-bishi (calthrops), smoke bomb, and bow. We...

Ninjas!

item.title: DynamicLoadObject?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Smoke39)
item.dc:creator: Smoke39
item.content:encoded:
How can I change the models a weapon uses in the middle of a game? I saw this DynamicLoadObject thingy in the SetHand function of the translocator. I stuck

Mesh = mesh(DynamicLoadObject("Botpack.Rifle2m", class'Mesh'));

somewhere and I get "Error, Bad or missing expression in parenthesis." Anyone have a solution?
I should be able to release an early version of my mod soon after I figure this out.
